com.swoval.files

Class FileCache<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.swoval.files.FileCache<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of data stored in the Directory.Entry instances for the cache
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public abstract class FileCache<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Provides an in memory cache of portions of the file system. Directories are added to the cache using the register(Path, boolean) method. Once a directory is added the cache, its contents may be retrieved using the list(Path, boolean, Directory.EntryFilter) method. The cache stores the path information in Directory.Entry instances.

    A default implementation is provided by apply(com.swoval.files.Directory.Converter<T>, com.swoval.files.FileCache.Option...). The user may cache arbitrary information in the cache by customizing the Directory.Converter that is passed into the factory apply(com.swoval.files.Directory.Converter<T>, com.swoval.files.FileCache.Option...).

      • list

        public abstract java.util.List<Directory.Entry<T>> list(java.nio.file.Path path,
                                                        int maxDepth,
                                                        Directory.EntryFilter<? super T> filter)
        Lists the cache elements in the particular path
        Parameters:
        path - The path to list. This may be a file in which case the result list contains only this path or the empty list if the path is not monitored by the cache.
        maxDepth - The maximum depth of children of the parent to traverse in the tree.
        filter - Only include cache entries that are accepted by the filter.
        Returns:
        The list of cache elements. This will be empty if the path is not monitored in a monitored path. If the path is a file and the file is monitored by the cache, the returned list will contain just the cache entry for the path.

      • list

        public java.util.List<Directory.Entry<T>> list(java.nio.file.Path path,
                                               boolean recursive,
                                               Directory.EntryFilter<? super T> filter)
        Lists the cache elements in the particular path
        Parameters:
        path - The path to list. This may be a file in which case the result list contains only this path or the empty list if the path is not monitored by the cache.
        recursive - Toggles whether or not to include paths in subdirectories. Even when the cache is recursively monitoring the input path, it will not return cache entries for children if this flag is false.
        filter - Only include cache entries that are accepted by the filter.
        Returns:
        The list of cache elements. This will be empty if the path is not monitored in a monitored path. If the path is a file and the file is monitored by the cache, the returned list will contain just the cache entry for the path.

        path - The path to list. This may be a file in which case the result list contains only this path or the empty list if the path is not monitored by the cache.

        is recursively monitoring the input path, it will not return cache entries for children if this flag is false.

        maxDepth - The maximum depth of children of the parent to traverse in the tree.
        Returns:
        The list of cache elements. This will be empty if the path is not monitored in a monitored path. If the path is a file and the file is monitored by the cache, the returned list will contain just the cache entry for the path.

        Lists the cache elements in the particular path recursively and with no filter.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The list of cache elements. This will be empty if the path is not monitored in a monitored path. If the path is a file and the file is monitored by the cache, the returned list will contain just the cache entry for the path.

      • register

        public abstract Either<java.io.IOException,java.lang.Boolean> register(java.nio.file.Path path,
                                                                       int maxDepth)
        Register the directory for monitoring.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to monitor
        maxDepth - The maximum depth of subdirectories to include
        Returns:
        an instance of Either that contains a boolean flag indicating whether registration succeeds. If an IOException is thrown registering the directory, it is returned as a Either.Left. This method should be idempotent and returns false if the call was a no-op.

      • register

        public Either<java.io.IOException,java.lang.Boolean> register(java.nio.file.Path path,
                                                              boolean recursive)
        Register the directory for monitoring.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to monitor
        recursive - Recursively monitor the path if true
        Returns:
        an instance of Either that contains a boolean flag indicating whether registration succeeds. If an IOException is thrown registering the directory, it is returned as a Either.Left. This method should be idempotent and returns false if the call was a no-op.

      • register

        public Either<java.io.IOException,java.lang.Boolean> register(java.nio.file.Path path)
        Register the directory for monitoring recursively.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to monitor
        Returns:
        an instance of Either that contains a boolean flag indicating whether registration succeeds. If an IOException is thrown registering the directory, it is returned as a Either.Left. This method should be idempotent and returns false if the call was a no-op.

        Create a file cache

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the DirectoryWatcher cannot be initialized
